Hi,
I am Yannis Jaquet.

I build websites and develop web applications, mostly with Ruby, Rails and Ember.js.

I am currently working in the laboratory of Digital Epidemiology lead by Prof. Marcel Salathé at EPFL where I am maintaining PlantVillage.

Here are some other public websites that I have built:

  • Department of Genetics & Evolution
  • Dojo de Kendo à Genève
  • Master in Biology (GDE)
  • The Paul Brönnimann Foundation
  • bioSeminars
  • foramBarcoding
  • Kasahara Kendo Cup

I am also the co-organizer of Geneva.rb, the Ruby user group in Geneva, and of Rails Girls Leman.
